collection.title: HTMLReference
collection.description: A free guide to all HTML elements and attributes.

collection.title: CSSReference
collection.description: CSS Reference is a free visual guide to CSS. It features the most popular properties, and explains them with illustrated and animated examples.

collection.title: Sass Guidelines
collection.description: An opinionated styleguide for writing sane, maintainable and scalable Sass.

collection.title: MDN Web Docs
collection.description: The MDN Web Docs site provides information about Open Web technologies including HTML, CSS, and APIs for both Web sites and progressive web apps. It also has some developer-oriented documentation for Mozilla products, such as Firefox Developer Tools.
